text: Guam was in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, Korea. The Guam National Olympic Committee was formed in 1976 and recognized by the IOC in 1986. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Guam profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Guam
title: Guam at the Olympics
